entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collins Bay 11:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -34.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -37.2°C
Wind: WSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
